author: Joshua Haigh
title: Katy Perry debuts drastic make over and announces comeback Grammy Awards performance
text:
Katy Perry debuts drastic make over and announces comeback Grammy Awards performance The Roar singer is set to return to the top of the charts once again Share Katy's got a new look (Photo: Getty Images) Share     
Katy Perry is finally making a comeback later this week. 
The record-breaking pop star's last album, Prism, was released four years ago, and fans haven't heard a peep from her since. 
With The Grammy Awards just days away, Katy has announced that she will be returning to the stage to debut her new single. 
In preparation for her return to music, the I Kissed A Girl singer has unveiled a dramatic new make over. Katy's changed her look (Photo: Getty) 
She's ditched her trademark brunette locks in favour of a striking new blonde hairstyle. 
The Grammy Awards announced the news on their official Twitter account, saying: " CONFIRMED: @katyperry returns to the #GRAMMYs stage Don't miss her performance on Music's Biggest Night Feb. 12 on @CBS! if you're excited!" 
Showing off her make over on Instagram, she wrote: "New life who dis" 
The Grammy Awards will air on February 12 and include performances from the likes of Beyonce, The Weeknd, Daft Punk, Adele and John Legend. https://www.instagram.com/p/BQMb2LCAURu/embed She's performing at the Grammys (Photo: Getty) 
Despite being nominated for 13 awards in the past, Katy has never managed to pick up a coveted Grammy Award.
